'''Harry''' is an [[NPC]] located in [[Stormbearer Point]], [[Mondstadt]]. He can be found patrolling near the Teleport Waypoint in the area.

Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player one 3{{star}} [[Cool Steel]].

===Appearance===
Harry wears one of the standard uniforms of the Knights of Favonius. The uniform consists of a black long-sleeve shirt, horse riding pants, gloves, and brown leather shoulder pads with brass-accented white plate armor worn on top. His vambraces however are black. Wing motifs decorate various parts of the armor along with the Knights of Favonius crest on the breastplate. A sheathed sword hangs from his belt on his left side.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Harry:''' Oh! hi!<!--"hi" is lowercase in-game-->
:'''Harry:''' Do you need a hand with anything?
:{{DIcon}} Who are you?
::'''Harry:''' I'm Harry from the Knights of Favonius.
::'''Harry:''' I have been posted here by the Knights to help victims of the attack.
::{{DIcon|Reward}} What kind of help do you provide?
:::'''Harry:''' For regular citizens, I help escort them safely to the city, to Springvale, or wherever.
:::'''Harry:''' For people who know how to look after themselves, adventurers and the like, I offer training in self-defense.
:::'''Harry:''' Seems like you fall in the latter category. So please take this sword, and take care of yourself.
::;(Obtain 3{{star}} [[Cool Steel]] ×1)
:{{DIcon}} What are you doing?
::'''Harry:''' I am gathering information on where monsters are stationed along this road. It'll help me better protect the merchants' route.
::'''Harry:''' If the situation gets worse, intel like this will help me convince the [[Jean|Acting Grand Master]] that the Stormbearer Mountains area is in dire need of a cleanup operation!
::'''Harry:''' Just like the [[Varka|Grand Master]]'s one, back in the day!
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Harry:''' What? You're leaving already?
{{Dialogue end}}

==Event Dialogue==
===Hidden Strife===
{{Dialogue start}}
:{{A|vo hyeq002 11 harry 01.ogg}} '''Harry:''' Hello there!
:{{A|vo hyeq002 11 harry 02.ogg}} '''Harry:''' I'm Harry of the Knights of Favonius. This area has been deemed highly dangerous, and I have been ordered to keep the public away.
:{{A|vo hyeq002 11 harry 03.ogg}} '''Harry:''' Vicious monsters have been reported around the Stormbearer Mountains.
:{{A|vo hyeq002 11 harry 04.ogg}} '''Harry:''' We have yet to ascertain their precise location, but the Knights of Favonius are on their trail.
:{{DIcon}} I don't see any other knights here except you...
:{{A|vo hyeq002 11 harry 05.ogg}} '''Harry:''' We need to confirm the monsters' positions before taking large-scale action. Otherwise, they'll see us coming and run off.
:{{A|vo hyeq002 11 harry 06.ogg}} '''Harry:''' Hence, the search team is operating in smaller units. They are operating very discreetly and staying away from the public eye.
:{{A|vo hyeq002 11 harry 07.ogg}} '''Harry:''' Please, for your safety, stay away from the Stormbearer Mountains.
{{Dialogue end}}
